title: Average ticket price Atlanta Hawks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2008/09, slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, slightly decreasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, and lastly roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2015/16.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009/10 and 2010/11.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 51.78 was reached at Year 2009/10
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 34.75 was reported at Year 2012/13
